RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPRING MAGIC away alertly set the pace drawing off into upper stretch coasting home as much the best. REACHING STRIDE stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch proving no match there finishing a clear second best. STARSHIP NUGGET tracked the pace pursuing in vain on the far turn racing evenly down the lane to best the others. LOVE TO ZOOM stalked the early pace weakening on the far turn finishing with little left. HONEY BOURBON was never involved. FOLK HERO folded up after a half mile. ARTUME struggled throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Reaching Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, no match, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Folk Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up after a half mile

ENTRY.NAME: Artume
ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Spring Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off lane, coasted home

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: H. Allen Poindexter & Zayat Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Love to Zoom
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, weakened far turn, little left lane

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nugget
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, pursued far turn, evenly lane to best others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELARY hesitating missing the break was rushed hard to reach the front clearing on the turn widening impressively down the lane for a convincing win. LUNAR PRAYER chased the pace racing six wide down the lane hanging on for place. ARTISTIC ALIBI slow early saved ground to upper stretch rallying belatedly along the rail. MISS LINDYSUE a step slow from the gate was hustled wide in pursuit to upper stretch weakening late. SHEZAGOLDGETTER slow early had some late action in the three path. JANTIVA pressed early being overtaken on the turn fading along the rail down the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Elary
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed the break, rushed hard to front, clear turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Jantiva
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, weakened turn, faded on rail lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 6 wide lane, held on for place

ENTRY.NAME: Artistic Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, rallied belatedly on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Shezagoldgetter
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, finished evenly three path

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Lindysue
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow at the break, hustled wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considere d In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARISMATICA saved ground emerging along the rail in upper stretch dueling late getting up gamely. ILLUSIONS OF LOVE chased the pace to upper stretch surging late six wide missing on the wire. CLAIRE'S DARLING sent clear set the pace to upper stretch digging in near the four path ceding between horses in the final yards. LEADING INDICATOR weakened on the turn. LITTLE LUCERITO faded on the turn. ANITA GRIGIO breaking slowly never fired.

ENTRY.NAME: Claire's Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear set pace, dug in near mid track, missed between

ENTRY.NAME: Carismatica
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, emerged upper stretch, rallied up gamely rail

ENTRY.NAME: Leading Indicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: weakened on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Little Lucerito
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Anita Grigio
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, never fired

ENTRY.NAME: Illusions of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid 6 wide lane, surged late missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INSACIABLE PRINCE set the pace through the far turn angling out to come five wide in upper stretch drawing out under urging. ECHOLITE stalked the pace chasing through the far turn coming four wide into upper stretch angling out six wide mid stretch finishing well a clear second best. ANDYLITHIC gave a mild rally on the far turn coming five wide in upper stretch using even action to hold the others safe. KNOCKOUT GUY tracked evenly weakening on the far turn posing no menace along the inside down the lane. WILDERZAR stalked the pace fading along the inside on the far turn. CAB BEEF was never involved. MR HARRY played no factor. THE MONSTER IRUS raced outside mounting a bid on the far turn flattening out in upper stretch. WILLIAM'S CAUSE hustled along in pursuit was spent on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, weakened far turn, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Cab Beef
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Andylithic
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally far turn, 5 wide lane, held others safe

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: William's Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, spent after a half mile

ENTRY.NAME: Echolite
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, angled out mid stretch, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Insaciable Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, angled wide to lane, widened at mid track

ENTRY.NAME: The Monster Irus
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, vied far turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Wilderzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded far turn, little left lane inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACE DESTROYER rushed to draw even three deep on the turn dueling into upper stretch battling abreast rival late extending up at the wire. I'M A COOL MAN pressured the pace dueling inside of rivals to upper stretch locking up with foe late battling to the end. SEMINOLE JUSTICE a step slow through the turn raced mid track down the lane finding best stride late. MACHINIST raced evenly through the turn racing four wide down the lane showing some late interest. CATES SWOOSH slow early saved ground to upper stretch vying evenly late along the rail. VALIANT THOR played no factor. I'M A LAWMAN pressured the pace dueling between horses on the turn wearing out the final eighth.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Cool Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside to lane, matched strides late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Cates Swoosh
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, to lae, vied evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Thor
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 5 wide lane, gained late

ENTRY.NAME: Machinist
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, had some interest

ENTRY.NAME: Ace Destroyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up three deep turn, dueled abreast lane extended up

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Lawman
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between turn, wore out ;lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUTTON BREEZE pressed the pace dueling on the inside through the turn being bumped in upper stretch digging in gamely late to win clear. DRIVE BY LAYOVER saved ground surging into upper stretch bidding gamely late along the rail. SILENT TIGER pressured the pace dueling between horses on the turn drifting in bumping rival in upper stretch weakening late. GATES OF HEAVEN slow early came five wide in upper stretch responding to finish well at mid track. UNCLE EARL pressed the pace moving three deep through the turn weakening in upper stretch. FEDERALE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, bumped top lane, dug in gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Gates of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, finished well mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between turn, bumped foe lane, short

ENTRY.NAME: Drive by Layover
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, surged to lane, bid gamely along the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Earl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep through the turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Federale
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $1 0,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAJESTIC FLAG chased inside engaging from the rail in upper stretch dueling up gamely. RED HURRICANE pressed the pace through the turn dueling three deep then abreast rival late battling to the wire. CHOCO ROCO slow early gave a mild rally on the turn then chased down the lane finishing well in the three path. THIRSTY bumped at the break was rushed to the front dueling through the turn coming between horses in upper stretch weakening late. HENDRIX played no factor. LUCKY SMILE gave way on the turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 30, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAY FASHION away alertly set the pace running clear into upper stretch digging in to pressure late. CROSSTOWN GIRL stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch closing in late. MOTHERWELL tracked the pace racing evenly to upper stretch vying willingly late. ESTA CALIENTE well back early gave a mild rally to upper stretch improving position. TAPPING SOUTH far back early passed tired ones. LIPARI was never involved. CHECK SIX played no factor. WICKED VALENTINE was always outrun easing to the wire.

ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, mild rally to lane, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, clear to lane, dug in late

ENTRY.NAME: Motherwell
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, roused to lane, vied willingly
